The game is trash, trust me. If you actually shoot people and get more than 5 kills / game, you will also get a ton of reports and your trust factor will be automatically lowered so you'll end up playing games with cheaters and people with new accounts. The last game i played had like one or two accounts with badges and accounts without even prime enabled in competitive matchmaking. Such a bad experience. After more than 1500 hours the game is still full of cheaters, basically the meta is to have one cheater in a team now.
THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER
Der Multiplyer ist richtig nervig, aber mit freunden kann es Spaß bringen. leider sehr unrealistische schadensmodelle.
